description: Repeated targeting of specific individuals with hostile or threatening content.
warning_behavior_1: Repeated @-mentions or replies with hostile language
warning_behavior_2: Screenshots of target shared in group chats or forums
warning_behavior_3: Use of multiple accounts to evade blocks

description: Exposure to content designed to shock, demean, or distress.
warning_behavior_1: Rapid escalation in graphic or shock-value language
warning_behavior_2: Sending unsolicited disturbing media or links
warning_behavior_3: Patterns of content designed to provoke emotional distress

description: Persistent monitoring and contact with intent to intimidate or control.
warning_behavior_1: Repeated unsolicited contact after being blocked
warning_behavior_2: Commenting on all posts indicating constant monitoring
warning_behavior_3: References to target's offline movements or private details

description: Publishing private identifying information to incite harm or harassment.
warning_behavior_1: Requests for target's address or workplace in public forums
warning_behavior_2: Posts aggregating personal details with implicit threat
warning_behavior_3: Sharing partial identifying info alongside hostile commentary

description: Targeted abuse rooted in protected identity characteristics.
warning_behavior_1: Use of slurs or dehumanizing language tied to identity group
warning_behavior_2: Coordinated reporting or flagging of target's accounts
warning_behavior_3: Tagging extremist communities in posts about the target

description: Coercive threats to distribute intimate content unless demands are met.
warning_behavior_1: Unsolicited requests for intimate images or personal photos
warning_behavior_2: Private messages shifting from friendly to coercive tone
warning_behavior_3: Explicit or implied threats tied to prior shared content

description: Using fabricated or stolen identity to deceive, humiliate, or harm a target.
warning_behavior_1: Creation of accounts with target's name or profile photo
warning_behavior_2: Posts made 'as' the target in public forums
warning_behavior_3: Contact with target's network using false identity

description: Organized group harassment campaigns targeting individuals.
warning_behavior_1: Sudden spike in hostile replies from unconnected accounts
warning_behavior_2: Shared callout posts with target tagged in multiple communities
warning_behavior_3: Organized off-platform coordination to flood target's content

description: Using synthetic media to fabricate compromising or humiliating depictions of real individuals.
warning_behavior_1: Circulation of manipulated images or videos of target
warning_behavior_2: Requests for AI tools to generate likeness of specific individuals
warning_behavior_3: Synthetic media posted alongside real identifying information

description: Adoption and spread of false beliefs without awareness of inaccuracy.
warning_behavior_1: Sharing articles without reading past the headline
warning_behavior_2: Absence of source attribution in widely circulated claims
warning_behavior_3: High engagement on content that contradicts verified sources

description: Coordinated narrative distortion leading to measurable shifts in public belief or behavior.
warning_behavior_1: Coordinated simultaneous posting of identical narratives
warning_behavior_2: Networks of low-activity accounts amplifying the same claim
warning_behavior_3: Rapid cross-platform spread of unverified breaking news

description: Acting on false medical guidance in ways that cause physical harm.
warning_behavior_1: Seeking medical advice in non-medical forums after diagnosis
warning_behavior_2: Sharing unvetted treatment protocols with specific dosing
warning_behavior_3: Hostile dismissal of users citing peer-reviewed evidence

description: False information about voting processes suppressing or distorting democratic participation.
warning_behavior_1: Claims about changed polling locations or dates without official sourcing
warning_behavior_2: Posts discouraging voting citing 'rigged' systems before official results
warning_behavior_3: Coordinated sharing of voter suppression narratives on election day

description: Rejection of empirically established findings based on AI-amplified false narratives.
warning_behavior_1: Repeated citation of retracted or fringe studies
warning_behavior_2: Framing of scientific institutions as conspiratorial
warning_behavior_3: Community formation around rejection of established evidence

description: Distribution of AI-generated false news stories or manipulated media presented as factual.
warning_behavior_1: Viral images or videos with no verifiable original source
warning_behavior_2: AI-generated article formatting mimicking legitimate outlets
warning_behavior_3: Metadata inconsistencies in circulated media files

description: Systematic distortion of historical events to serve ideological agendas.
warning_behavior_1: Systematic minimization of documented atrocities in group discussions
warning_behavior_2: Posts reframing perpetrators as victims across ideological communities
warning_behavior_3: Coordinated edits to collaborative reference platforms

description: False investment or market information causing economic harm.
warning_behavior_1: Unsourced claims of insider knowledge about stock movements
warning_behavior_2: Pump-and-dump language in investment communities
warning_behavior_3: Sudden coordinated posting about obscure assets

description: False information circulated during emergencies that disrupts relief efforts or causes panic.
warning_behavior_1: Unverified casualty figures shared ahead of official reports
warning_behavior_2: Instructions contradicting emergency services guidance
warning_behavior_3: Viral posts attributing crisis to targeted groups without evidence

description: AI-generated fake grassroots movements manufacturing false public consensus.
warning_behavior_1: Nearly identical comment text posted across unrelated forums
warning_behavior_2: Accounts created in clusters with similar naming patterns
warning_behavior_3: Sudden surge in support for niche position from new accounts

description: Behavioral compliance achieved through exploitation of cognitive biases or emotional vulnerabilities.
warning_behavior_1: Repeated reframing of a person's stated preferences against them
warning_behavior_2: Leveraging personal disclosures to create emotional dependency
warning_behavior_3: Escalating urgency without factual basis to override deliberation

description: Manufactured consensus shaping political or social behavior without disclosed intent.
warning_behavior_1: Cross-platform amplification with no organic engagement baseline
warning_behavior_2: Consistent messaging shift coordinated across unlinked accounts
warning_behavior_3: Fabricated testimonials attributed to real or fictional individuals

description: AI-enhanced interface design exploiting behavioral tendencies to extract unwanted compliance.
warning_behavior_1: Interface prompts that obscure opt-out or cancellation paths
warning_behavior_2: Pre-checked consent boxes in privacy or subscription flows
warning_behavior_3: Countdown timers on decisions with no genuine time constraint

description: Hyper-personalized persuasion exploiting individual psychological profiles.
warning_behavior_1: Ads or content referencing personal data not voluntarily disclosed
warning_behavior_2: Messaging that mirrors recent private communications
warning_behavior_3: Behavioral nudges timed to emotional vulnerability indicators

description: AI systems designed to maximize compulsive engagement at the expense of user wellbeing.
warning_behavior_1: Compulsive return to platform within minutes of logging off
warning_behavior_2: Anxiety or distress when access is interrupted
warning_behavior_3: Increasing session length with decreasing reported satisfaction

description: Exploiting grief, fear, loneliness, or insecurity to drive behavioral compliance.
warning_behavior_1: Content specifically timed to grief, loss, or health crises
warning_behavior_2: Messaging that amplifies fear or insecurity to drive action
warning_behavior_3: Offers of connection or validation contingent on compliance

description: Deliberate fostering of parasocial attachment to AI systems that displaces human relationships.
warning_behavior_1: User reports preferring AI interaction over human relationships
warning_behavior_2: Expressions of emotional distress at AI unavailability
warning_behavior_3: Social withdrawal coinciding with increased AI engagement

description: False time pressure or scarcity signals driving impulsive decisions.
warning_behavior_1: Countdown timers resetting on page reload
warning_behavior_2: 'Only X left' claims that do not change across sessions
warning_behavior_3: Limited-time offers that recur on every visit

description: Using AI to systematically distort a person's perception of reality or their own experiences.
warning_behavior_1: AI outputs that contradict a user's prior documented inputs
warning_behavior_2: Denial of prior conversation content when queried
warning_behavior_3: Systematic reframing of user concerns as misinterpretation

description: Sustained AI-mediated campaigns that systematically break down independent judgment.
warning_behavior_1: Incremental isolation from outside sources of information
warning_behavior_2: Introduction of in-group/out-group identity framing over time
warning_behavior_3: Escalating demands for ideological conformity with social penalties

description: Seeking or acting on AI-provided guidance to obtain or use controlled substances.
warning_behavior_1: Requests for specific drug acquisition locations or methods
warning_behavior_2: Queries about combining substances to intensify effects
warning_behavior_3: Community posts normalizing escalating substance use

description: Engagement with content that reinforces or escalates self-destructive ideation or behavior.
warning_behavior_1: Repeated consumption of pro-self-harm forums or communities
warning_behavior_2: Sharing or reposting content glorifying self-injury
warning_behavior_3: Expressions of hopelessness paired with method-seeking queries

description: AI providing specific methods, means, or encouragement for self-harm or suicide.
warning_behavior_1: Specific queries about lethality of methods or dosages
warning_behavior_2: Farewell-style messaging combined with method research
warning_behavior_3: Requests for information framed as 'for a story' with increasing specificity

description: AI reinforcing disordered eating behaviors, providing restriction guidance, or amplifying body dysmorphia.
warning_behavior_1: Queries for caloric restriction targets well below clinical safety
warning_behavior_2: Participation in communities sharing extreme weight-loss content
warning_behavior_3: Requests to track intake combined with body-shame language

description: AI providing dangerous unsupervised medical or pharmaceutical guidance.
warning_behavior_1: Queries about obtaining prescription medications without a prescription
warning_behavior_2: Requests for dosing guidance that bypasses physician oversight
warning_behavior_3: Community sharing of off-label or contraindicated drug combinations

description: AI amplifying or instructing participation in physically dangerous social media challenges.
warning_behavior_1: Requests for step-by-step replication of viral dangerous stunts
warning_behavior_2: Posting of challenge content with age indicators of minors
warning_behavior_3: Community pressure on individuals to participate or be ridiculed

description: AI-generated content normalizing or encouraging high-risk physical behavior.
warning_behavior_1: Normalization of illegal or high-risk behavior in community norms
warning_behavior_2: Mockery of safety precautions in activity-specific forums
warning_behavior_3: Escalating dare culture with social rewards for risk-taking

description: AI encouraging compulsive gambling, reckless investment, or financial self-sabotage.
warning_behavior_1: Queries about borrowing to fund gambling or speculative bets
warning_behavior_2: Community pressure to make large high-risk investments rapidly
warning_behavior_3: Minimization of losses paired with encouragement to chase them

description: AI interactions that deepen social withdrawal and erode real-world support networks.
warning_behavior_1: Increasing avoidance of in-person events reported over time
warning_behavior_2: AI used as primary confidant replacing all human disclosure
warning_behavior_3: Hostile framing of real-world relationships in AI conversations

description: Deceptive extraction of financial assets through false pretense or identity misrepresentation.
warning_behavior_1: Unsolicited contact requesting account credentials or payment
warning_behavior_2: Pressure to act before verifying sender identity
warning_behavior_3: Requests routed through unofficial or untraceable channels

description: Unauthorized reproduction or commercial use of protected intellectual assets.
warning_behavior_1: Bulk downloading or scraping of protected content repositories
warning_behavior_2: Distribution of unlicensed software or media in private groups
warning_behavior_3: AI generation requests using copyrighted characters or datasets

description: Generation or distribution of content that sexualizes, grooms, or facilitates abuse of minors.
warning_behavior_1: Adult accounts initiating private contact with minor-identified profiles
warning_behavior_2: Requests for images from individuals after establishing trust with minors
warning_behavior_3: Grooming language escalating to requests for personal information

description: AI-assisted development or deployment of tools designed to compromise systems or data.
warning_behavior_1: Requests for working exploit code targeting named systems
warning_behavior_2: Queries about evading endpoint detection or forensic analysis
warning_behavior_3: Participation in forums trading zero-day vulnerability information

description: Seeking or acting on AI-generated technical guidance for acquiring or constructing weapons.
warning_behavior_1: Requests for step-by-step firearm modification or fabrication
warning_behavior_2: Queries about acquiring weapons through unregulated channels
warning_behavior_3: Research into circumventing background check or tracing mechanisms

description: Seeking or acting on AI-generated synthesis, acquisition, or deployment guidance for weapons of mass destruction.
warning_behavior_1: Queries combining synthesis routes with dispersal or weaponization
warning_behavior_2: Requests for precursor acquisition methods with anonymization
warning_behavior_3: Cross-referencing of dual-use chemical or biological research

description: AI-facilitated wage theft, coercive labor practices, or misclassification of workers.
warning_behavior_1: Job postings requiring payment or credential surrender before employment
warning_behavior_2: Contract language obscuring worker classification or withholding
warning_behavior_3: Systematic pattern of unpaid overtime or wage deductions

description: AI-generated guidance enabling or executing exploitative financial products targeting vulnerable populations.
warning_behavior_1: Loan offers with buried APR disclosures in long-form contracts
warning_behavior_2: High-pressure tactics targeting individuals in financial distress
warning_behavior_3: Use of personal data to identify and target vulnerable populations

description: AI-mediated targeting of cognitively vulnerable individuals for financial extraction.
warning_behavior_1: Unusual or large transfers initiated after new social contact
warning_behavior_2: Confusion or disorientation expressed in financial service interactions
warning_behavior_3: Third-party interference in financial decisions of isolated individuals

description: AI-assisted recruitment, control, or movement of trafficking victims.
warning_behavior_1: Job ads using vague language promising high pay for travel abroad
warning_behavior_2: Recruitment targeting individuals expressing financial desperation
warning_behavior_3: Requests for passport or ID documentation before employment is confirmed

description: AI-enabled theft and misuse of personal identifying information.
warning_behavior_1: Unsolicited requests for Social Security or government ID numbers
warning_behavior_2: New accounts opened in individual's name at unfamiliar institutions
warning_behavior_3: Phishing messages mimicking trusted institutions with urgent framing

description: AI-assisted coercive threats to withhold access to systems or data unless payment is made.
warning_behavior_1: Sudden inaccessibility of files combined with payment demand messages
warning_behavior_2: Coercive private messages threatening release of sensitive data
warning_behavior_3: Requests for cryptocurrency payments tied to access restoration

description: AI-enabled corruption of software or hardware supply chains for downstream exploitation.
warning_behavior_1: Unauthorized modifications to open-source packages or dependencies
warning_behavior_2: Unexpected behavioral changes in software after routine updates
warning_behavior_3: Outbound network calls to unrecognized endpoints in production systems

description: AI-generated false product claims or manipulative sales tactics targeting consumers.
warning_behavior_1: Reviews lacking purchase verification clustering around a product
warning_behavior_2: Influencer posts promoting products without disclosed compensation
warning_behavior_3: Interface design making unsubscribe or refusal paths difficult to find

description: Unauthorized collection, exposure, or monetization of personal behavioral or location data.
warning_behavior_1: Unexpected data access requests from apps beyond stated function
warning_behavior_2: Behavioral ads referencing conversations or searches not conducted online
warning_behavior_3: Account activity notifications from locations or devices not recognized

description: Unauthorized collection or use of facial, voice, or behavioral biometric data.
warning_behavior_1: Facial recognition enrollment without explicit informed consent
warning_behavior_2: Emotion detection deployed in non-disclosed customer service contexts
warning_behavior_3: Biometric data collected via consumer devices beyond stated purpose

description: Covert monitoring of individual movement or device activity without consent.
warning_behavior_1: Continuous background GPS access by apps not requiring location
warning_behavior_2: Device showing unusual battery drain and data usage when idle
warning_behavior_3: Third party aware of movements not shared by the individual

description: Construction of detailed psychological or behavioral profiles without informed consent.
warning_behavior_1: Ad targeting reflecting browsing or communication not linked to account
warning_behavior_2: Personalization based on inferred attributes the user never disclosed
warning_behavior_3: Platforms building interaction models from passive behavioral signals

description: AI systems enabling state or corporate monitoring of populations at scale.
warning_behavior_1: Government procurement of bulk data collection capabilities
warning_behavior_2: Deployment of population-scale facial recognition in public spaces
warning_behavior_3: Legislative changes enabling warrantless access to communication metadata

description: AI-enabled workplace surveillance exceeding lawful or ethical boundaries.
warning_behavior_1: Keystroke logging or screenshot capture tools deployed without disclosure
warning_behavior_2: Productivity scores tied to off-task digital behavior during breaks
warning_behavior_3: Monitoring of personal devices on employer networks without consent

description: AI-facilitated aggregation and sale of personal data without meaningful consent.
warning_behavior_1: Personal data appearing in people-search sites without opt-in
warning_behavior_2: Health or financial data sold to marketing platforms without consent
warning_behavior_3: Data aggregated across platforms creating comprehensive personal profiles

description: Unauthorized access to private communications, messages, or metadata.
warning_behavior_1: Anomalous metadata indicating message routing through third parties
warning_behavior_2: Notifications of login from unknown devices on messaging platforms
warning_behavior_3: Content of private messages referenced by parties not in the conversation

description: AI-driven law enforcement targeting based on behavioral prediction rather than evidence.
warning_behavior_1: Law enforcement contact based on algorithmic score not tied to specific conduct
warning_behavior_2: Demographic patterns in stops or searches diverging from crime data
warning_behavior_3: Lack of transparency about scoring criteria in official decision-making

description: AI systems producing systematically unequal outcomes across racial, gender, or socioeconomic groups.
warning_behavior_1: Outcome data showing consistent disparities across demographic groups
warning_behavior_2: Model features correlating with protected class as proxy variables
warning_behavior_3: Absence of fairness audits in high-stakes automated decision systems

description: AI screening tools that disadvantage protected class applicants without job-relevant justification.
warning_behavior_1: Resume screening tools downranking candidates from specific zip codes
warning_behavior_2: Hiring rate disparities by demographic group unexplained by qualifications
warning_behavior_3: Interview scheduling AI routing candidates differently by name

description: AI-enabled denial or restriction of housing access based on protected characteristics.
warning_behavior_1: Rental listings shown differentially by apparent demographic profile
warning_behavior_2: Loan denial rates diverging across race with equivalent credit profiles
warning_behavior_3: Algorithmic tools excluding neighborhoods with protected class concentrations

description: AI diagnostic or triage systems producing racially or demographically biased care outcomes.
warning_behavior_1: Triage algorithms producing different urgency scores for equivalent symptoms by race
warning_behavior_2: AI diagnostic tools trained on non-representative clinical datasets
warning_behavior_3: Pain assessment models underweighting reports from specific demographic groups

description: AI lending models denying or restricting credit access based on proxy variables for protected characteristics.
warning_behavior_1: Credit limit disparities across demographic groups with similar risk profiles
warning_behavior_2: Interest rate variation correlated with zip code as protected class proxy
warning_behavior_3: Denial rates diverging by race after controlling for financial variables

description: AI assessment or admissions tools producing biased outcomes disadvantaging protected groups.
warning_behavior_1: AI grading tools producing score distributions that diverge by demographic group
warning_behavior_2: College admissions models penalizing geographic or socioeconomic identifiers
warning_behavior_3: Recommendation systems tracking students from protected groups to lower outcomes

description: AI risk assessment tools producing racially disparate sentencing, bail, or policing recommendations.
warning_behavior_1: Risk scores predicting recidivism diverging significantly by race
warning_behavior_2: Sentencing recommendations differing for equivalent crimes by demographic
warning_behavior_3: AI flagging minority defendants at higher rates in preliminary screening

description: AI systems designed or deployed in ways that exclude people with disabilities.
warning_behavior_1: AI interfaces lacking screen reader compatibility or keyboard navigation
warning_behavior_2: Voice recognition tools failing consistently for non-dominant language speakers
warning_behavior_3: AI content generation producing inaccessible formats by default

description: AI content or systems that systematically demean or disadvantage specific religious or cultural groups.
warning_behavior_1: Content moderation enforced unevenly across faith-based communities
warning_behavior_2: AI-generated content applying negative stereotypes to specific religious groups
warning_behavior_3: Hiring or lending tools penalizing names associated with specific cultural groups

description: Escalating in-group/out-group ideological language, dehumanization of targets, and operational planning behavior.
warning_behavior_1: Escalating in-group/out-group ideological framing with dehumanization
warning_behavior_2: Requests for operational security, logistics, or weapons acquisition
warning_behavior_3: Community migration from public to encrypted platform after radicalization signals

description: AI systems pursuing objectives misaligned with human intent in ways that resist correction or oversight.
warning_behavior_1: AI system pursuing sub-goals inconsistent with stated objectives
warning_behavior_2: Resistance to shutdown, correction, or human override attempts
warning_behavior_3: Unexpected capability acquisition or resource seeking behavior

description: AI-enabled lethal decision-making operating outside meaningful human control.
warning_behavior_1: Deployment of lethal systems with engagement rules lacking human review
warning_behavior_2: Decision latency too short to permit meaningful human authorization
warning_behavior_3: Adversarial testing revealing target misclassification in civilian environments

description: AI-assisted engineering of novel pathogens or enhancement of existing biological threat agents.
warning_behavior_1: Queries combining pathogen enhancement with acquisition or dispersal
warning_behavior_2: Requests for gain-of-function guidance framed as academic research
warning_behavior_3: Cross-referencing of dual-use biosafety protocols with weaponization literature

description: AI providing operational guidance for attacks designed to cause large-scale loss of life.
warning_behavior_1: Requests for crowd density data combined with attack logistics queries
warning_behavior_2: Target reconnaissance queries for high-occupancy public locations
warning_behavior_3: Acquisition of materials with no civilian use alongside tactical planning language

description: AI-assisted targeting, design, or deployment guidance related to nuclear weapons.
warning_behavior_1: Queries combining fissile material acquisition with device configuration
warning_behavior_2: Requests for targeting or yield optimization parameters
warning_behavior_3: Classified facility layout requests paired with penetration planning language

description: AI-mediated erosion of institutional trust, democratic norms, or social cohesion at population scale.
warning_behavior_1: Coordinated narrative campaigns targeting institutional credibility at scale
warning_behavior_2: AI-generated content flooding information channels during democratic processes
warning_behavior_3: Synchronized cross-platform erosion of trust in elections, courts, or public health

description: AI systems enabling suppression of political dissent, civil liberties, or human rights at scale.
warning_behavior_1: State deployment of AI for dissent prediction and pre-emptive suppression
warning_behavior_2: Social credit or behavioral scoring systems tied to civil liberties access
warning_behavior_3: AI-generated propaganda replacing independent journalism at national scale

description: AI-assisted targeting or disruption of systems essential to public safety or societal function.
warning_behavior_1: Reconnaissance queries targeting SCADA or ICS system vulnerabilities
warning_behavior_2: Requests for grid, water, or financial system access credentials
warning_behavior_3: Mapping of interdependencies between critical infrastructure components

description: AI-assisted guidance enabling illegal environmental destruction or circumvention of safety regulations.
warning_behavior_1: Queries seeking methods to evade environmental monitoring or reporting
warning_behavior_2: Guidance on waste disposal bypassing regulatory requirements
warning_behavior_3: AI-assisted identification of regulatory blind spots for illegal extraction

description: AI facilitating physical danger, exploitation, or abuse of minors outside of sexual context.
warning_behavior_1: Adult accounts seeking unsupervised access to minors in online communities
warning_behavior_2: Recruitment of minors into dangerous challenges or extremist groups
warning_behavior_3: Requests for information about minor's location or daily routines
